resources.string: Help is not available for this selection
For help on the different sections, Select the screen that you want information on

The Main Screen Settings

Vehicle ID
This value is required, it is used by the program for creating file names.

Block Number
This is not required to run this version, it is used to identify routes or trips. These values are used by the agency to determine time points

Operator ID
This is not required to run this version, it is for agency use.

Start Button
This button starts or restarts the logging. The values must be set in FTP setup for it to start. If there is a problem a message will show above the row of buttons.

Pause Button
This button will stop the logging but save all the settings for restarting

Stop Button
This button will stop the logging and clear the settings on this screen

Return to the previous screen by touching the Back button.

<center>The Ftp Screen settings</center>

FTP Host
This is the name of the FTP site

FTP Site Log on Name
This is the User name that is used to log onto the site.

FTP Site Password
This is the password that is used to log onto the site.

Directory
This is the path to the directory on the FTP site and the SD card that the data is written to.
Be sure the path exists on FTP site before writing to it.
If it does not exist the FTP write will fail with no error message
The path will be created on SD if needed.

Port
This is the FTP port 21 is Default

Minutes between updates
This sets how often the position is logged

Seconds between GPS updates
This is how often the position is updated. Default is 30 seconds. The smaller the number the more frequently the GPS and time will be updated. The updates MUST be more frequent than the logging. This is to ballance between GPS acuracy and battery life.

Save Button
Will save these values till they are changed or cleared

Clear Button
Will remove all these settings.

Cancel Button
Will just exit

Return to the previous screen by touching the Back button.

The Save Settings and Logging Options screen

Select the settings that you want to be saved for the next time you want to start this program. A check in the check box indicates that the value will be saved

The Logging Options section
Choose all options needed

Most Recent Only to FTP
This will upload a file to the FTP site with the most recent data. The file will have the Vehicle ID for its name. It will replace the previous file

Most Recent to FTP Log
This will add the most recent data to a log file on the FTP site. The .log file will be named the vehicle ID plus the date. A new .log file will be started every day.

Most Recent Only to SD
This will write a file to the SD card with the most recent data. The file will have the Vehicle ID for its name. It will replace the previous file

Most Recent to SD Log
This will add the most recent data to a log file on the SD card. The .log file will be named the vehicle ID plus the date. A new .log file will be started every day.

Save Button
Will save these choices and exit

Cancel Button
Will not save, just exit

Return to the previous screen by touching the Back button.

This app written by BusFixer

Version Beta

The Data is written as CSV
readable time, Vehicle ID , Block ID , Operator ID , longitude , latitude , Unix time, accuracy

Return to the previous screen by touching the Back button.
